android.manifestAdditions:
<manifest android:installLocation="auto">
<permission android:name="air.com.sgn.cookiejam.gp.permission.C2D_MESSAGE" android:protectionLevel="signature"/> <uses-permission android:name="air.com.sgn.cookiejam.gp.permission.C2D_MESSAGE"/> <uses-permission android:name="com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEIVE"/> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS"/> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WAKE_LOCK"/> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD"/> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET"/> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE"/> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE"/> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE"/> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="com.android.vending.BILLING"/>
<application android:enabled="true" android:debuggable="false">
<!-- AD-X --> <receiver android:name="com.AdX.tag.AdXAppTracker" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="com.android.vending.INSTALL_REFERRER"/> </intent-filter> </receiver> <meta-data android:name="APP_NAME" android:value="air.com.sgn.cookiejam.gp"/> <meta-data android:name="ADX_CLIENT_ID" android:value="SGN76hgpDP"/> <meta-data android:name="ADX_LOG_LEVEL" android:value="0"/> <!-- <meta-data android:name="forward.Admob" android:value="com.admob.android.ads.analytics.InstallReceiver"/> --> <!-- AD-X -->
<!-- Ratings --> <meta-data android:name="RTTestMode" android:value="false"/> <!-- CONDITIONAL --> <meta-data android:name="RTRateText" android:value="If you enjoy using %APP_NAME%, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!"/> <!-- CONDITIONAL --> <meta-data android:name="RTMarketURL" android:value="market://details?id=air.com.sgn.cookiejam.gp"/> <meta-data android:name="RTUsesUntilPrompt" android:value="0"/> <meta-data android:name="RTDaysUntilPrompt" android:value="2"/> <meta-data android:name="RTTimeBeforeReminding" android:value="0"/> <!-- Ratings -->
<!-- Chartboost --> <meta-data android:name="CBAppID" android:value="52e02e9df8975c0b734079aa"/> <meta-data android:name="CBSignature" android:value="a0475dbb49af422739fd8419d80d193235911762"/> <activity android:name="com.jesusla.ane.CustomActivity"/> <activity android:name="com.chartboost.sdk.CBDialogActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboard|keyboardHidden" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustResize" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent" android:launchMode="singleTop"/> <!-- Chartboost -->
<!-- SGN mobile --> <receiver android:name="com.sgn.mobile.AlarmReceiver"/> <meta-data android:name="GCMSenderID" android:value="\ 727245302334"/> <activity android:name="com.sgn.mobile.OpenPushActivity" android:label="Notification"/> <receiver android:name="com.sgn.mobile.GCMBroadcastReceiver" android:permission="com.google.android.c2dm.permission.SEND"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="com.google.android.c2dm.intent.RECEIVE"/> <action android:name="com.google.android.c2dm.intent.REGISTRATION"/> <category android:name="air.com.sgn.cookiejam.gp"/> </intent-filter> </receiver> <service android:name="com.sgn.mobile.GCMIntentService"/> <!-- SGN mobile -->
<activity android:name="com.jesusla.ane.CustomActivity"/> <activity android:name="com.jesusla.facebook.FacebookExtendedPermissionsActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.NoDisplay"/> <activity android:name="com.jesusla.facebook.FacebookLoginActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.NoDisplay"/> <activity android:name="com.jesusla.facebook.FacebookGraphActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.NoDisplay"/> <activity android:name="com.facebook.LoginActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar"/> <meta-data android:name="ANEDebug" android:value="false"/> <meta-data android:name="com.facebook.sdk.ApplicationId" android:value="\ 405661196232030"/> <meta-data android:name="SGNAppID" android:value="2113"/>
<!-- STOREKIT --> <service android:name="com.jesusla.google.BillingService"/> <receiver android:name="com.jesusla.google.BillingReceiver"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="com.android.vending.billing.IN_APP_NOTIFY"/> <action android:name="com.android.vending.billing.RESPONSE_CODE"/> <action android:name="com.android.vending.billing.PURCHASE_STATE_CHANGED"/> </intent-filter> </receiver> <receiver android:name="com.amazon.inapp.purchasing.ResponseReceiver"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="com.amazon.inapp.purchasing.NOTIFY" android:permission="com.amazon.inapp.purchasing.Permission.NOTIFY"/> </intent-filter> </receiver> <meta-data android:name="SKProvider" android:value="Google"/> <meta-data android:name="SKIdentity" android:value=""/> <!-- STOREKIT -->
<!-- GooglePlay Games Services --> <meta-data android:name="com.google.android.gms.games.APP_ID" android:value="\ 879298079941" /> <meta-data android:name="com.google.android.gms.version" android:value="4242000"/>
<activity android:name="com.sgn.googleservices.MainActivity" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.NoDisplay"/>
<activity android:launchMode="standard"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
</application> </manifest>
